title: I've used NA Boards since beta. Do not force us to use it here.
body:
For one very simple reason:
**We do not have the population to support boards. EVEN NA HARDLY DOES.**

This reddit style nonsense simply does NOT work on low populations.

All it takes is a single person to censor the entirety of boards with 2 or 3 accounts (I can go to any sub-board and do this on NA easily already), not to mention our range of discussion is very lacking.

The forums work perfectly for our smaller population.

Remember, one of the main reasons Riot designed boards was because the forums didn't work with very high populations, like NA and only NA GD experienced?

We do not need boards, and it won't even work properly for us.

replies.body: Not to mention the fact that you can only have 1 attachment  at a time. I know it's not major, but still.
Riot: Lets change a fully functioning forum to some bugged as shit reddit style board. YEAH GREAT IDEA

> Riot: Lets change a fully functioning forum to some bugged as shit reddit style board. YEAH GREAT IDEA

I'd upvote you, but my account isn't level 5.

Sorry.
Oh, wait. Upvotes and Downvotes aren't even working anyway.

Then Riot will just have to step up their game on spammers. People can still go looking for what they want and if they really want to find something digging for it won't bother them. GD constantly gets filled up with trash threads that add nothing to anything. Might happen here but new stuff gets shown on the boards page so it is not like nothing new will get seen.

Still in beta here but surprised we can't just flag troll trash.
